DataElement.preferredName: Post Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Other Planned Therapeutic Procedure Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe other planned post hematopoietic cell transplantation therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Other Planned Therapeutic Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._To devise, contrive, or formed in design._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Planned; devised, contrived, or formed in design.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
To devise, contrive, or form in design.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: released as entered during ISO compliance update

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

AlternateNames.name: Post Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Other Planned Therapeutic Procedure Specify

ReferenceDocuments.name: Specify the other planned pos
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify the other planned post-HCT therapy:

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2673840
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedProcedure > PlannedActivity > StudyActivity > DefinedProcedure.nameCode(CD).originalText [1] WHERE DefinedProcedure [1, component] > DefinedCompositionRelationship [A]> DefinedProcedure [2, composite] > DefinedCompositionRelationship [B] > DefinedProcedure [3, component] AND DefinedProcedure.nameCode [1] = "Administer Hematopoietic Stem CellProduct (Transplantation)" AND DefinedProcedure.nameCode [2] = "Perform Overall Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation" AND DefinedProcedure.nameCode [3] = "Administer therapy" AND DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [A] IS LESS THAN DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [B]

DataElement.changeDescription: . Added human readable def. System generated def displayed as alt def. No version needed. AK 10/17/14
